Wow. https://twitter.com/AndrewHClark/status/1176925242436050944 …

In case you don’t believe the transcript, which showed zero evidence of quid pro quo or @realDonaldTrump pressuring anyone...

“I think you read it—that nobody pushed me”

The "favor" section of the call is referencing "crowdstrike," or an investigation into election interference. This is NOT the same thing as the Biden section.

- ZERO discussion of foreign aid quid pro quo
